Text.text: Well? Are you ready to admit how wrong you were, Madame Moss-For-Brains?
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: Impressive work, I'll admit. But your little mushroom cave is more suited to a light lunch than a magical banquet.
Text.speaker: ANDREAEA

Text.text: You could do with a light lunch, you dried-up old liverwort.
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: He who resorts to personal insults has already lost. Try harder next time, loamy old fool. You've a long way to go before you can best my moss garden.
Text.speaker: ANDREAEA
